Header.title: Stay Curious
Header.paragraph: Enjoy access to bestselling book summaries and premium content from our partners, all available in 15-minute audio or text segments.

features.name: Get Smarter
features.text: Instantly unlock the knowledge contained in the world's best books.

features.name: Find Inspiration
features.text: Get the best ideas from leading business mavericks, health gurus, political pundits, and trailblazing scientists.

features.name: On the Go
features.text: Eyes on the road? Hands on the barbells? No problem: all Instareads are converted to audio for your listening pleasure.

extraFeatures.name: Business
extraFeatures.text: Cash in on advice from finance experts and entrepreneurs.

extraFeatures.name: Politics

extraFeatures.name: Health & Fitness

extraFeatures.name: Social Sciences
